        protected void merge(int index)
        Merges the bin in the given position with the next bin
        Parameters:
        index - index of the bin to merge, index must satisfy 0 <= index < binCount - 1

      • mergeInsert

        protected void mergeInsert(int mergeAt,
               int insertAt,
               float v,
               long c)
        Merges the bin in the mergeAt position with the bin in position mergeAt+1 and simultaneously inserts the given bin (v,c) as a new bin at position insertAt
        Parameters:
        mergeAt - index of the bin to be merged
        insertAt - index to insert the new bin at
        v - bin position
        c - bin count

      • shiftRight

        protected void shiftRight(int start,
              int end)
        Shifts the given range the histogram bins one slot to the right
        Parameters:
        start - index of the first bin to shift
        end - index of the rightmost bin to shift into

      • shiftLeft

        protected void shiftLeft(int start,
             int end)
        Shifts the given range of histogram bins one slot to the left
        Parameters:
        start - index of the leftmost empty bin to shift into
        end - index of the last bin to shift left

      • foldFast

        public ApproximateHistogram foldFast(ApproximateHistogram h,
                            float[] mergedPositions,
                            long[] mergedBins)
        Parameters:
        h - histogram to be merged into the current histogram
        mergedPositions - temporary buffer of size greater or equal to this.capacity()
        mergedBins - temporary buffer of size greater or equal to this.capacity()
        Returns:
        returns this histogram with h folded into it

        Returns a compact byte-buffer representation of this ApproximateHistogram object storing actual values as opposed to histogram bins Requires 3 + 4 * count bytes of storage with count <= 127
        Parameters:
        buf - ByteBuffer to write the ApproximateHistogram to

      • sum

        public double sum(float b)
        Returns the approximate number of items less than or equal to b in the histogram
        Parameters:
        b - the cutoff
        Returns:
        the approximate number of items less than or equal to b

      • getQuantiles

        public float[] getQuantiles(float[] probabilities)
        Returns the approximate quantiles corresponding to the given probabilities. probabilities = [.5f] returns [median] probabilities = [.25f, .5f, .75f] returns the quartiles, [25%ile, median, 75%ile]
        Parameters:
        probabilities - array of probabilities
        Returns:
        an array of length probabilities.length representing the the approximate sample quantiles corresponding to the given probabilities

      • toHistogram

        public Histogram toHistogram(float[] breaks)
        Computes a visual representation of the approximate histogram with bins laid out according to the given breaks
        Parameters:
        breaks - breaks defining the histogram bins
        Returns:
        visual representation of the histogram

      • toHistogram

        public Histogram toHistogram(int size)
        Computes a visual representation of the approximate histogram with a given number of equal-sized bins
        Parameters:
        size - number of equal-sized bins to divide the histogram into
        Returns:
        visual representation of the histogram

      • toHistogram

        public Histogram toHistogram(float bucketSize,
                    float offset)
        Computes a visual representation given an initial breakpoint, offset, and a bucket size.
        Parameters:
        bucketSize - the size of each bucket
        offset - the location of one breakpoint
        Returns:
        visual representation of the histogram
